Container.Name: SpoolmanSync
Container.Overview: Sync Bambu Lab AMS trays with Spoolman filament inventory via Home Assistant. Provides a web dashboard for assigning spools to AMS trays, QR/barcode scanning for quick spool lookup, and automatic filament usage tracking after prints. Requires Home Assistant with ha-bambulab integration and a Spoolman instance.
Container.Requires: Requires Home Assistant with ha-bambulab integration installed, and a Spoolman instance.
